title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8139.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8139.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) [Eff. until

April 14, 1993, see also subd. (a) below.] Route 303. Route 303, SH 1898, between IR 87/287 and Mountainview Road, a distance of 3.5 miles in the Towns of Clarkstown and Orangetown. (a) [Eff. April 14, 1993, see also subd. (a) above.] Route 303. Route 303, SH 1898, from exit 12 of IR 87/287 south to the New Jersey state line, a
distance of 6.0+- miles in the Towns of Clarkstown and Orangetown. (b) [Eff. until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (b) below.] Route 304. Route 304, SH 9006, between Route 59 West and North Mieeletown Road, a distance of 1.7+-
miles, in the Towns of Clarkstown and Orangetown. (b) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (b) above] Route 17. Route 17
between the junction of Route 59 and IR 87 (exit 15A) and the Orange county
line in the Village of Sloatsburg and the Town of Ramapo. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8139.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
